page.title: 03CULHAM LABORATORY
page.content:
Culham Laboratory is the largest single source of employment in the area although only a small proportion of the staff, of over 1000, actually live in Clifton Hampden.
The laboratory is primarily the United Kingdom Atomic Energy Authority's centre for nuclear fusion research although other work is also carried out. The fusion programme is now operated in conjunction with other countries of the European Atomic Energy Community.
Outside the fusion field Culham has expertise in many areas which make it a leading contractor laboratory for problems of advanced electro- technology.
